attributes.action: Give people affected by windfarms through sight more rights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
our small country community is being ruined by wind farms already there are two large wind farms in view and yet another two proposed. which means as I look out they would be all around my property
 At present only those who are close neibours are contacted for their views ! surely those affected through sight should have more rights re planning and compensation for lost property value's. why should companies who do not care about blighting an area be allowed to turn a whole area from open country side into industrial land which is what it seems is happening in rural Lincolnshire. The coastal wind farms should be encouraged not the cheaper option for profit at the cost of peoples community's
